comment.author: 7161402@N02
comment._content: Hello! I teach GCSE Astronomy at a school in Yorkshire, England. My students are working on a class project designing an online revision guide to support the course. They really like your image and have asked me to contact you to see whether you would allow it to be used in their guide? Look forward to hearing from you! Regards, Eleanor
